name: The Only Room (Kibrjr)
description:
Your mission is to rescue the hostage.  

But be careful! He is surrounded by enemies in one room! The other rooms are filled to the brim with bombs, and if you open the wrong door, it will explode and you will lose the misson!

Usefull Controls: 

Press "E" to interact with objects like the door, window or get items.

If you cant grab an item, or you need to offset the camera to get it, try pressing Esc, than centering the mouse with the white square and than right clicking.

There may be a secret mode
